title: Discover
subtitle: Learn the basic ideas behind evolution
instructions:
Steve Backshall will be your guide around the Museum as you explore evolution. Here’s how it works:

You are hunting for 8 objects on the ground floor of the Museum. The map gives you a clue where to look.

When you get close to the object in the photo a video will automatically appear.

If this doesn’t happen, tap the icon and enter the four-digit code you can see on the label in the display.
finished_text: You have gathered evidence of some of the complex processes of the evolution of life on Earth. Well done!
